# [Seeplus API](http://seeplus-api.hive.pt)

The Seeplus API client for Python.

## Configuration

| Name              | Type  | Default | Description                                                  |
| ----------------- | ----- | ------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| **SEEPLUS_TOKEN** | `str` | `None`  | The `Bearer` token to be used in the authentication process. |

## License
